full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): #, ,DAM CAN CHOS KYI RGYAL PO'I BZLOG BSGYUR RKYEN NGAN SEL BYED ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @006B (CES 'JAM DPAL @007A *, ,GSHIN RJE GSHED KYI BKA' SDOD DAM CAN CHOS KYI RGYAL PO BZLOG BSGYUR RKYEN NGAN SEL BYED ZHES BYA BA, 'DI NI KHA GCIG GIS 'JAM DPAL GSHIN RJE GSHED KYI BZLOG BSGYUR ZER BA DE LA CHOS RGYAL GYI BZLOG BSGYUR ZHES MING BTAGS NAS TSIGS MI MTHUN PA GCIG BYAS PA MANG PO YOD PA DANG, CHOS RGYAL GYI BZLOG BSGYUR MING RNYED PA DANG, SNGA MOS DON GNYER CAN DGOS BSKUL ZHING, SLAR YANG SMAN PA BLO BZANG BKRA SHIS SBYIN BDAG GI RIM 'GRONG DGOS PA CHE ZHES BSKUL BA'I NGO MA LCOG PAR, RANG DANG SNYAM @007B MNYAM GZHAN LA'ANG PHAN PA AER SDING SNYAMS PAS SLOB GNYER MA BYAS PA'I BLUN PO SNYING KHAMS CAN CHOS RJE BLO BZANG 'PHRIN LAS MING CAN GYIS GONG MA RNAMS KYIS, GSUNGS RGYUN LA BRTEN NAS SUG BRIS SU BGYIS PA'O, 'DIS KYANG RGYAL BA'I BSRAN BA RIN PO CHE DAR ZHING RGYAS LA YUN RING DU GNAS PAR GYUR CIG , ,,BKRA SHIS PAR GYUR CIG ,)
